00008 kBoard::kBoard(const int& gridX, const int& gridY, QWidget* parent )
00009         : QGraphicsView( parent ),
00010         _mGridSize( gridX, gridY),
00011         _mSelectedX(0),
00012         _mSelectedY(0)
00013 {
00014         //initialization
00015         initBoardParameters();
00016 
00017         createScene();
00018 
00019         createItems();
00020 
00021     _mSelectionTimeLine = new QTimeLine(150, this);
00022     _mFlipTimeLine = new QTimeLine(500, this);
00023 
00024     connect(_mSelectionTimeLine, SIGNAL(valueChanged(qreal)), this, SLOT(updateSelectionStep(qreal)));
00025         updateSelectionStep(0);
00026 }

00028 kBoard::~kBoard()
00029 {
00030         foreach ( const int& x, _mItems.keys() )
00031         {
00032                 foreach ( const int& y, _mItems[ x ].keys() )
00033                 {
00034                         delete _mItems[ x ][ y ];
00035                 }
00036         }
00037         _mItems.clear();
00038 
00039         delete _mContainerItem;
00040 }

00054 void kBoard::createItems()
00055 {       
00056         // selection item
00057         _mSelectionItem = new kCardItem( QRectF( -60, -60, 120, 120 ), Qt::gray );
00058         _mSelectionItem->setParentItem( _mContainerItem );
00059         _mSelectionItem->setZValue( -1 );
00060 
00061 
00062         //Create cards
00063         for (int i = 0; i < _mGridSize.width(); i++) {
00064                 for (int j = 0; j < _mGridSize.height(); j++) {
00065                         kCardItem* cardItem = new kCardItem( QRectF( -54, -54, 108, 108 ), QColor( 214, 240, 110, 128 ) );
00066                         connect(cardItem, SIGNAL(returnCardItem(kCardItem*)), this, SLOT(selectedCardItem(kCardItem*)));
00067                         cardItem->setFlag(QGraphicsItem::ItemIsSelectable);
00068                         cardItem->setPos( posForLocation( i, j ) );
00069                         cardItem->setParentItem( _mContainerItem );
00070                         cardItem->setFlag( QGraphicsItem::ItemIsFocusable );
00071                         cardItem->setPixmap( QPixmap( ":/board/single.png" ) );
00072                         _mItems[ i ][ j ] = cardItem;
00073                 }
00074         }
00075 
00076         // default item and selection
00077         setCurrentItem( 0, 0, false );
00078 }
00079 
00084 void kBoard::createScene()
00085 {
00086         // area bound
00087         QRectF bounds( ( -_mGridSize.width() /2.0 ) *150, ( -_mGridSize.height() /2.0 ) *150, _mGridSize.width() *150, _mGridSize.height() *150 );
00088 
00089         // scene
00090         _mScene = new QGraphicsScene( bounds, this );
00091         setScene( _mScene );
00092 
00093         // container item
00094         _mContainerItem = new kCardItem( bounds, QColor( 226, 255, 92, 64 ) );
00095         _mScene->addItem( _mContainerItem );
00096 }

00102 void kBoard::initBoardParameters()
00103 {
00104         //GraphicView Properties
00105         setFrameStyle( QFrame::NoFrame );
00106         setHorizontalScrollBarPolicy( Qt::ScrollBarAlwaysOff );
00107         setVerticalScrollBarPolicy( Qt::ScrollBarAlwaysOff );
00108         setCacheMode( CacheBackground );
00109         setViewportUpdateMode( FullViewportUpdate );
00110         setRenderHints( QPainter::Antialiasing | QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform );
00111         setBackgroundBrush( QPixmap( ":/board/background.jpg" ) );
00112 
00113 #ifndef QT_NO_OPENGL
00114         setViewport( new QGLWidget( QGLFormat( QGL::SampleBuffers ) ) );
00115 #endif
00116 }

00119 QPointF kBoard::posForLocation(int x, int y) const
00120 {
00121         return QPointF(x * 150, y * 150)
00122                 - QPointF((_mGridSize.width() - 1) * 75, (_mGridSize.height() - 1) * 75);
00123 }

00140 void kBoard::setCurrentItem( int x, int y, bool animate )
00141 {
00142         if (!_mItems[ x ][ y ]) return;
00143 
00144         _mItems[ x ][ y ]->setFocus();
00145 
00146         if ( animate )
00147         {
00148                 _mSelectionTimeLine->stop();
00149                 _mStartPos = _mSelectionItem->pos();
00150                 _mEndPos = posForLocation( x, y );
00151                 _mSelectionTimeLine->start();
00152         }
00153         else
00154         {
00155                 _mSelectionItem->setPos( posForLocation( x, y ) );
00156                 _mStartPos = _mSelectionItem->pos();
00157         }
00158 }
00159 
00170 void kBoard::selectedCardItem( kCardItem* item)
00171 {
00172         kCardItem* itemInList = 0;
00173         _mSelectedX = _mSelectedY = 0;
00174         item->setFocus();
00175         //iteration
00176         for (int i = 0; i < _mGridSize.width(); i++) {
00177                 for (int j = 0; j < _mGridSize.height(); j++) {
00178                         itemInList = _mItems[i][j];
00179                         if (itemInList)
00180                                 if (itemInList == item) { //if item is found in the list of cardItems
00181                                         _mSelectedX = i;
00182                                         _mSelectedY = j;
00183                                 }
00184                 }
00185         }
00186         setCurrentItem(_mSelectedX, _mSelectedY, true);
00187 }
00188 
00189 void kBoard::updateSelectionStep(qreal val)
00190 {
00191         //Animation with timeline
00192         QPointF newPos(_mStartPos.x() + (_mEndPos - _mStartPos).x() * val,
00193                 _mStartPos.y() + (_mEndPos - _mStartPos).y() * val);
00194         _mSelectionItem->setPos(newPos);
00195 }

00197 void kBoard::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent *event)
00198 {
00199     QGraphicsView::resizeEvent(event);
00200     fitInView(_mScene->sceneRect(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio);
00201 }
